articles.title: ChatGPT's cheapest options now show you ads
articles.summary: ChatGPT users will soon start seeing 'sponsored' links unless they pay at least $20 per month for a Plus subscription.
articles.author: Stevie Bonifield

articles.title: AI-generated ads dropped the ball at this year's Super Bowl
articles.summary: Not a single one of these commercials made betting on gen AI seem like a good idea.
articles.author: Charles Pulliam-Moore

articles.title: Anthropic debuts new model with hopes to corner the market beyond coding
articles.summary: Anthropic's latest Opus 4.6 model represents a major step forward in AI capabilities, targeting enterprise users beyond traditional coding tasks.
articles.author: Hayden Field

articles.title: Claude has been having a moment â€” can it keep it up?
articles.summary: "Now you're just like, 'Here's the magic castle. Build it.' And it gets done." Anthropic's Claude is riding a wave of developer enthusiasm.
articles.author: Hayden Field

articles.title: OpenAI Frontier is a single platform to control your AI agents
articles.summary: OpenAI launches Frontier, a unified platform that lets enterprises manage and orchestrate multiple AI agents from one dashboard.
articles.author: Robert Hart

articles.title: Reality is losing the deepfake war
articles.summary: Why you can't label your way into consensus reality amid the AI deepfake apocalypse. C2PA labels alone aren't enough.
articles.author: Nilay Patel

articles.title: GitHub adds Claude and Codex AI coding agents
articles.summary: GitHub integrates Anthropic's Claude and OpenAI's Codex as AI coding agents, marking a significant expansion of AI-powered development tools.
articles.author: Tom Warren

articles.title: Anthropic says 'Claude will remain ad-free,' unlike ChatGPT
articles.summary: Anthropic fires shots at OpenAI with Super Bowl ad campaign promising Claude will stay ad-free, as ChatGPT prepares to show sponsored links.
articles.author: Dominic Preston

articles.title: 2026 AI investments will cost more than the Moon landing
articles.summary: Meta, Microsoft, Amazon, and Alphabet are planning to spend $670 billion on AI infrastructure this year, dwarfing historic capital efforts.
articles.author: Jess Weatherbed

articles.title: Google's annual revenue tops $400 billion for the first time
articles.summary: Google parent Alphabet reports record annual revenue exceeding $400 billion, driven largely by cloud and AI services growth.
articles.author: Emma Roth

articles.title: Lyra: Generative 3D Scene Reconstruction via Video Diffusion
articles.summary: Lyra can generate 3D scenes from a single image or video, using self-distillation for real-time rendering and dynamic scene generation without multiple views.
articles.author: NVIDIA Research

articles.title: MeshMosaic: Scaling Artist Mesh Generation via Local-to-Global Assembly
articles.summary: MeshMosaic generates high-resolution 3D meshes with over 100,000 triangles by breaking shapes into smaller patches for better detail and accuracy.
articles.author: AI Art Weekly #134

articles.title: Wan-Animate: Unified Character Animation and Replacement
articles.summary: Wan-Animate can animate characters from images by copying expressions and movements from video, with seamless character replacement keeping original lighting.
articles.author: AI Art Weekly #134

articles.title: OmniInsert: Mask-Free Video Insertion of Any Reference
articles.summary: OmniInsert can insert subjects from any video or image into original scenes without masks, solving data scarcity and subject-scene balance problems.
articles.author: AI Art Weekly #134

articles.title: Google releases Mixboard: Canvas-Based Ideation with Gen AI
articles.summary: Google released Mixboard, a canvas based ideation tool with generative AI capabilities for creative brainstorming and design exploration.
articles.author: AI Art Weekly #134

articles.title: Alibaba releases Qwen-Image-Edit-2509 with ControlNet support
articles.summary: An improved Qwen-Image-Edit model that supports multi-image editing with ControlNet support for precise creative control.
articles.author: AI Art Weekly #134

articles.title: STAR: Speech-to-Audio Generation via Representation Learning
articles.summary: STAR generates audio from speech input while capturing important sounds and scene details, bridging the gap between spoken words and soundscapes.
articles.author: AI Art Weekly #134
